name: Setting Change in Windows Firewall with Advanced Security
description: Setting have been change in Windows Firewall
query: (winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Firewall\ With\ Advanced\ Security\/Firewall AND event.code:(2002 OR 2003 OR 2008))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Firewall\ With\ Advanced\ Security\/Firewall AND event.code:(2002 OR 2003 OR 2008))`
